plot: The television and studio audience of a teen-oriented variety show is taught questionable life lessons from its morally bankrupt host.
title: Totally for Teens
plot_es: The television and studio audience of a teen-oriented variety show is taught questionable life lessons from its morally bankrupt host.
plot_en: The television and studio audience of a teen-oriented variety show is taught questionable life lessons from its morally bankrupt host.
